CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Tandem
2. Single junction

Explanation:

1. Tandem is a type of material structure used in solar cells, where multiple layers of photovoltaic material are stacked together to increase efficiency.
2. Single junction refers to a type of solar cell structure that consists of a single layer of photovoltaic material.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are Tandem and Single junction.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the corrected "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Tandem

Explanation:

1. Tandem is a type of material structure used in solar cells, where multiple layers of photovoltaic material are stacked together to increase efficiency. It is a material name that refers to a specific type of solar cell structure.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Tandem |

Note that "Single junction" is not a specific material name, but rather a description of a type of solar cell structure. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as "Property Name":

1. PCE (solar power conversion efficiency)
2. tandem structure
3. single junction structure

These three entities are all names of properties or characteristics of solar cells, and they are used to describe the performance or attributes of the cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (solar power conversion efficiency)

The entities "tandem structure" and "single junction structure" are not directly related to material properties, but rather refer to the design or configuration of the solar cells. Therefore, they are not relevant to the concept of Material Property in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities that refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (solar power conversion efficiency) |

PV.content:

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 10.6%
2. 9.2%

These are the values of the property "solar power conversion efficiency" (PCE) that have been demonstrated in cells with tandem and single junction structures, respectively.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 10.6%
2. 9.2%

These are the values of the property "solar power conversion efficiency" (PCE) that have been demonstrated in cells with tandem and single junction structures, respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented in the same words as in the original paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 10.6% |
| 9.2% |
